lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: As our story began, what did Jesus want the disciples to do?
answers: Go to a quiet place to rest

questions.text: When the crowds saw Jesus leaving, what did they do?
answers: Ran and got there ahead of them
Waited there until the next day

questions.text: How did Jesus feel when he saw the crowd?
answers: He felt concern because they were like lost sheep without a shepherd
He felt tired and wanted to leave

questions.text: How long did Jesus teach the crowd and heal the sick?
answers: All night and into the morning

questions.text: When the disciples told Jesus to send the crowd home, what did Jesus say?
answers: Don’t tell me what to do!
Let me take care of that

questions.text: When Jesus said, 'You feed them,' what did the disciples say?
answers: It would take half a year's pay to buy that much!

questions.text: What did Andrew say to Jesus?
answers: This boy has five loaves of bread and two fish
We should send the crowd away
Let’s collect money for the food

questions.text: As the disciples passed out the food, what happened?
answers: Jesus multiplied it and fed everyone

questions.text: How many baskets of leftovers were there?
